foreignData.name: Barrins Zauberbuch
foreignData.text:
Du kannst während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Seitenmarke auf Barrins Zauberbuch legen.
4, {T}, opfere Barrins Zauberbuch: Ziehe X Karten, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Seitenmarken auf Barrins Zauberbuch ist.

name: Barrin's Codex
originalText:
During your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Barrin's Codex.
o4, oc
T, Sacrifice Barrin's Codex: Draw X cards, where X is the number of page counters on Barrin's Codex.

rulings.text: Adding a counter is optional. If you forget to add one during your upkeep, you cannot back up and add one later.

text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Barrin's Codex.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Barrin's Codex: Draw X cards, where X is the number of page counters on Barrin's Codex.
